transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello. Yes sir, boliye.
Executive: Ji, good morning. Naseem Ahmed ji se baat ho rahi hai Indian Engineering Works mein?
Customer: Ji haan boliye.
Executive: Ji Naseem ji Pankaj baat kar raha hu IndiaMART head office se relationship manager. Kaise hain sir?
Customer: Haan main theek hu.
Executive: Aapka sir ek feedback receive hua tha sir aapka aapki company se ki aapko jo buyleads vagaira hai properly nahi mil raha ya fir aap satisfied nahi hai buyleads se.
Customer: Ji. To usi ke liye maine connect kiya hai ki kahan pe kya problem issue aa raha hai sir services mein.
Executive: Aapki dekhiye main day one se ek hi cheez bol raha hu.
Customer: Hamare ko jo buyleads aa rahi hai wo 100% aapki only inquiries hi.
Executive: Jo aapne first time jab aapne plan sale kiya tha bola tha 100% genuine buyleads hai. Verified buyleads hai. Lekin mere ko 100% aapki inquiries receive ho rahi hai. Jin customer se bhi main connect karta hu ha bas humne waisi post kiya tha dekhne ke liye. Aur abhi hume requirement nahi hai. Mostly 90% customer aapke aise aa rahe hai.
Customer: Theek hai aur baki 10% customer.
Executive: Ye ye jo 10% customer hai wo bas wo quotation leke khamosh ho jate hai. Aage kuch bhi nahi hota hai. Follow up follow up lo to wo call bhi answer nahi karte sir.
Customer: To Ahmed ji main aapka product dekh pa raha hu jaise jaggery plant, sugarcane crusher day one se ye cheez bol raha hu main.
Executive: Day one se bol bolte sir.
Executive: Haan Naseem ji maine usi liye call kiya hai aapko aapka jo concern chala hua aa raha hai ki pehle to sir Naseem ji aapko time milta hai ek mahine ka pura. Agar jaise hi aap services use karna start karte ho aapka welcome call hua hoga hai na? Kisi team ne demo diya hoga aapko. Jo bhi person ne aapko sale kiya usne chahe kuch bhi bola ho aapko jhoot bola ho jaisa bhi bola ho hume to nahi malum hota kyuki hai na kya bol ke aapko.
Customer: Wohi to baat hai na sir sale lekin nahi aapko ek mahine ka pura time milta hai.
Executive: Haan aapko one month ka pura time milta hai jab aap use karna start karte ho aapko kisi bhi point pe lagta hai ki main is pe nahi benefit nikal pa raha ya nahi mere ko ho raha proper response nahi mil raha ya nahi kar paunga ya nahi ho pa raha hai customer us tarike ka nahi mil raha hai is platform pe. Ki aap apne jo bhi account manager hote hai unko aap complain karke aap apna amount jo hai refund le sakte hai ki mere ko yahan se nahi ho raha proper.
Customer: Amount refund lene ke liye to aapki services nahi li thi agar jo amount hi refund lena tha.
Executive: Main samajh raha hu na isliye nahi nahi pehle to maine aapka wo kiya ki jhoot wala jo aapne bola na ki jhoot bol ke sale kar diya to wo jhoot wala wahin pe clear ho jata hai kisi ne aapko kuch bhi bola ho pro rata pe mere ko refund milta one month ki aapki service to one month ka mera amount deduction ho jata.
Customer: Haan bilkul bilkul Naseem ji wo pro rata basis pe milta hai aapko aapko refund. Abhi jo dusra main bata deta hu aapko.
Executive: Sir aap solution ki to baat nahi karte simple bolta aap hum satisfied nahi hai to aap ye terminate kar dijiye sir ye kaisa aapka solution hai aap mujhe bolne denge to main aapko samjhaunga Naseem ji agar main abhi bolna chah raha hu main aap bolne denge to main aapko kuch aapko.
Customer: Aapne bhi dekhiye call karte hi bola aapko one month ka time milta hai aap satisfied nahi hai to aap terminate kar lijiye aap solution pe baat hi nahi karte aap log terminate ki baat karte hai.
Executive: To Naseem ji abhi main directly solution pe aa jata na to aap pata hai kya bolte ki char logo ne bhi pehle aise hi bola hai ki koi mera problem ya resolve nahi ho pa raha to mujhe aap karwaiye kya ho sakta hai best hai na wo bolte hai to isliye pehle main usko point pe clear kar diya Pankaj ji Pankaj ji samjhiye maine pehle jo aapne bola na ki jhoot bol ke mujhe sale kar diya gaya hai. Maine uske liye bola hua hai.
Customer: Mere ko to yahi bola within within a month mein aapko hum business de denge. Chalo theek hai nahi aaya patience rakho patience rakho patience rakho.
Executive: To maine usi ke liye bola sir maine Naseem ji usi ke liye bola hai patience to waqai mein jisne bhi aapko bola hai wo patience rakhna hi padega abhi panch mahine hue hai aapko live hue hai.
Customer: Ho gaye five months patience rakhte hue five months ho gaye na.
Executive: Haan to IndiaMART sir koi guarantee nahi deta business ka agar aapne dekha ho to business ki guarantee nahi hai aap digital marketing karte hai. Main wohi bol raha hu digital marketing karte hai hum koi bhi customer jaggery plant jo bhi aapke catalog mein categories registered hai agar wo search hota hai google pe hum aapki company ko promote karte hai aur aap abhi bhi karke dekhiye to aapki company hum show karwa rahe hai. Dusri baat hai customer ka sir customer IndiaMART khud se nahi generate karta jo aapki location pe aapke aas pass location pe jo log ye search karenge un logo ko aapka company dikhega aur wohi log aap se connect karenge usme IndiaMART pehle involve nahi hota us customer ke sath mein ki pehle IndiaMART baat karega customer ko fir aap se wo karega theek hai aur verified isliye hoti hai ki koi bhi buylead agar aap khud se bhi try karenge aapke product ka ya kisi aur product ka aap inquiry dalna chahenge usme aapko OTP verification bola jayega jab tak aap OTP verify nahi karenge aapka buylead post nahi hoga aur agar koi customer OTP verify karke buylead post kar raha hai sir to it means ki wo kahin na kahin interested hai us product ka quotation lene lene ke liye isliye wo aage apna OTP verify karke wo apna inquiry post kar raha hai hai na wo baat alag hai ki uska do teen logo se baat ho jata hai uske baad aap connect karte ho ya koi bhi connect karta hai customer palat raha hai ya kuch bhi bol raha hai end of the time only seller ki galti rehti hai seller ko nahi seller ki galti nahi hai sir abhi aapke do order convert ho jayenge Naseem ji abhi aapke do order convert ho jayenge aap bolenge ki IndiaMART bahut achcha platform hai ye hai wo hai aur aapke product line mein agar aap dekhenge to aur bhi companies registered hai jo ki pehle kafi samay se registered hai aur business convert ho raha hai isliye wo continue karte hue aa rahe hai sir kyuki ek saal jaise abhi aapko panch mahine ho gaye.
Customer: Sir aapke panch mahine ho gaye man lijiye aise ek saal ho jata hai aur aapko business convert nahi hota aap next year payment karenge IndiaMART mein nahi karenge to wo log kyu kar rahe honge wo log hai na nahi karenge na aap bhi payment to wo log isliye kar rahe hai unko business convert ho raha hai unke agar aap chahe to reviews rating check kijiye unke customer unko approach kar rahe hai aur dheere dheere aapka bhi visibility listing rating reviews jab badhega aapki company pe bhi customer trust karega order convert hona shuru hoga start hoga sir buylead hum isliye bolte hai fir bhi consume kariye consume kariye kyuki IndiaMART ka algorithm buylead based hai sir jitna jyada lead kisi category ka kisi location se consume karenge aap utna jyada hamara algorithm aapko promote karta hai us location pe us category pe sir isliye hum bolte hai buylead aap fir bhi use kariye. Buylead wala customer aap sahi ho rahi hai.
Customer: Haan haan sahi kar rahe hai sir wo aap use kar rahe hai waha sahi kar rahe hai kisi location ka hi ho raha hoga kisi category ka hi ho raha hoga aur us category mein aapki company ko promote hi kar rahe hai lekin customer ki bhi to abhi dekhiye customer teen tarike se hum aapko dete hai first tarika to customer buylead post karke chala gaya hai na buylead post karke chala gaya aap log consume karte ho fir aap baat karte ho customer se lekin do tarike aur jo hai ki customer ne search kiya aur kuch companies dikhai di aapki company bhi dikhai di customer ko usne directly call kar liya ya kisi dusre ki company dikhai di do teen logo ko call karke quotation le liya wo customer buylead post nahi karega. Third option hai ki customer ne na to buylead post kiya na call kiya usne directly message ke liye dal diya waha pe to jisko wo dalega usi ke pass uska customer ka details jayega to hume us level pe aana hai ki customer mere ko directly call ya directly message ke through connect karna start ho gaya kyu kyuki jab main back call karunga us customer ko ya call receive karunga to mujhe apna introduction dene ka jarurat nahi hai kyuki customer ne already meri company ka name mera product specification pricing sab kuch dekha hai kahin na kahin wo interested tha mere se quotation lene mein isliye usne mujhe message ya call kiya hai to mujhe us level pe leke aana hai apni company ko ki ha customer mere ko priority de raha hai itni companies competitors ke beech mein.
Customer: Abhi panch mahine marketing mein kitna time lagega sir?
Executive: Time nahi aisa nahi hai sir ki aapka aise kuch particular time hai ki do mahine teen mahine panch mahine wo aap ye dekhiye dir.indiamart.com jis page pe customer land karta hai na us page ko aap bas open karke dekhiye apni jin jin locations pe aap deal karte ho aur jin jin categories pe aap samjhiye us pe ki konsi company aa rahi hai unka kya product price aa raha hai meri company us pe kahan dikhai de rahi hai mera product ka price photo kya aa raha hai bas customer bhi to wohi dekh raha hai sir aur wahin se kisi na kisi ko call kar de raha hai customer to aapke office mein aapko bhi nahi dekhne aa raha na unki company ko janta na aapki company ko. To isi purpose se customer bhi search kar raha hai google kar raha hai usne company dekhi usne call kiya similar aap bhi us page pe visit kariye dekhiye ki customer ko aisa kya lag raha hai ki us company pe call pe call kiye ja raha hai meri company ko skip kar de raha hai waha se genuine customer. Bas wo apne ko samajhna hai yaha pe algorithm matlab IndiaMART sir India IndiaMART platform nahi hai.
Customer: Ho gaya. Theek hai theek hai.
Executive: Agar dekhiye sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is not satisfied with the buyleads.

- Receiving only inquiries, not genuine buyleads.

- 90% customers are just posting for viewing.

- 10% take quotation and become silent.



Resolution:

- Executive explained about the refund policy.

- Executive explained about digital marketing.

- Executive explained about the customer generation process.

- Executive explained about the buylead algorithm.



Next Steps: 

- None



Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, refund, digital marketing, customer generation
